Summary: "light" type sighting in central/southwest VA, US - moving west
divs: sighting detailsi just wanted to pass along a "light" type sighting from central\southwest virginia, usa tonight - so that in case any other reports that are related to this from other locations can be consolidated, compared, etc. (i for one would love to know someone else can confirm this - even if it was something mundane like a rocket or something!) it was near about 8pm tonight (10\22\08), facing west to southwest direction. it was a large primarily whitish-amberish light sphere that was far up and off in the sky and was much larger and brighter than venus, about 2x. it was very bright and which is what caught my attention. i thought at first it was an airplane - like when they come in for a landing with its front beams on. however the airport was in a different direction - so then i thought it has to be venus. i found some other constellations then found venus and then thought - there's nothing else except a comet? it would be like holmes17 (ie: no visible tail) - except it was much brighter. there were occasionally various wisps and shapes of light that would morph from the standard overall round light sphere shape. from my position, the time it was visible and the distance it covered, i'd imagine it was visible in far western va and into tn or ky too. it was mostly stationary and the movement was primarily subtle and slow, i'd gauge about 6 inches per minute - visually across the sky. (ie: pick a spot on the sky hold your arm and hand out to mark it with your finger - then measure about 6" from your pointing finger away from the original spot) at one point it completely faded out, and faded back in reappearing about another relative 6" away - but almost instantly. this process was repeated intermittently a few times. it travelled from high mid sky facing west (about 70 degrees from horizon) to almost disappearing over the horizon within about a 30 minute period. when it began to get nearer to the horizon from my vantage point, the colors began to slowly (yet rapidly enough to notice) fade from whitish-amber to oranges, reds, and randomly between these colors. i'm hoping there will turn up some other reports and hopefully footage from others. i'm going to try and post this on some of the other ufo sighting reports websites. i'm currently downloading video footage from my digital camera. it was at night w\ a consumer camera - so i'm not hopeful... especially after seeing the still image. i'll attach the untouched still that i took once it was near the horizon and flashing colors. of course it's night with no tripod - so it's the typical snakey\curly light trails pic - ie: useless. [descrip: there is grass\field at bottom, then telephone pole... and the orangy\reddy light trail thing is what resulted from the camera when aimed at the color changing sphere on the horizon] i mainly wanted to log this so when other reports turn up, it will be good to have for cross referencing.
